scripts.release:auto: node -e "const msg=process.env.MSG||'patch'; require('child_process').execSync(`npm version patch -m \"chore(release): vers達o %s (${msg})\" && git push && git push --tags`, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): vers達o %s (patch)" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): vers達o %s (minor)" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): vers達o %s (major)" && git push && git push --tags
